text: qad kanat lakum us'watun hasanatun fi ib'rahima wa-alladhina ma平ahu idh qalu liqawmihim inna buraau minkum wamimma ta平buduna min duni l-lahi kafarna bikum wabada baynana wabaynakumu l-平adawatu wal-baghdau abadan hatta tu'minu bil-lahi wahdahu illa qawla ib'rahima li-abihi la-astaghfiranna laka wama amliku laka mina l-lahi min shayin rabbana 平alayka tawakkalna wa-ilayka anabna wa-ilayka l-masiru
